channel.title: Crash
channel.description: I get a crash to desktop at the elevator in bm_c1a1e. It happens during the level load wait. Happens every time. Deleted game, downloaded fresh file (from a different site), reinstalled, still happens, same place.

item.title: Crash
item.dc:creator: thornyp
item.description:
I get exactly the same problem.

Read full topic
